title: OHHHH NOOO PLZZZZZ NOOOOO HELP!!!!!!!!
body: ok so i was playing ranked and people started to report me cuz i was toxic ( bronze life) and then RITO did the thing when i can't type in all chat and i have a limited message in team chat. AND THEN I WENT TO SEE MY SKINS AND ALL OF THEE SKINS THAT I UNLOCKED THX TO CRAFTING  DOESNT SHOW UP BUT I CAN STILL USE THEM. PLZ RIOT CHECK OUT MY ACCOUNT A LOT OF PROBLEM ARE IN THAT ACCOUNT like sometimes it say 1005 ip when i have 300ip things like that just do a check up. thx and don't worry I'm not toxic anymore..

replies.body:
It seems like there's a lot going on. Can you post a screenshot here of the issue with missing skins that you had unlocked in Hextech Crafting?

Additionally, the IP sync issues are something we're aware of and are looking into. Basically what's happening is for some purchases or transactions, your client isn't updating your IP balance afterwards, and it resyncs either at random or when you go to purchase something. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

s/o tarpons blade you answered quick damm and i broke my phone imma send the pic as soon as possible but its not a big problem cuz i can still use the skins and the thing is that when you click on the champion and you look at the skins it doesn't say OWNED anymore and i got scared
